page.title: 09A day in my life
page.content: I go downstairs to the kitchen for my breakfast. Whilst I eat my breakfast I watch the Popeye cartoon on the television.For breakfast I normally have a bowl of cornflakes and a fried egg on toast.My mum,dad and brother have cereal and toast and jam..After breakfast I help mum clear up and then go into the lounge and have a game of snooker.Half way through my second game my mum shouts down to me,"Simon the bathroom is empty." So I run upstairs to the bathroom where I clean my teeth.It is now about 8 O clock.My dad backs his car out of the path and my mum backs hers out of the garage.I have to leave my house 8.15a.m.because my mum and dad have to go to work and my brother has to go to school.I say goodbye to everyone and start walking down the road to a house where I have to stay until it is time for school.
